title: The Mighty Mississippi
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 482 words, Level N (Grade 2), Lexile 850L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and K
description: From Lake Itasca in Minnesota to the Gulf of Mexico, the Mississippi River runs its mighty course. The Mighty Mississippi introduces readers to the geography and the many benefits of the river to people and wildlife alike. Students will have an opportunity to connect to their prior knowledge as they read. Text is supported with detailed photographs and text features. Book and lesson also available at Levels H and K.
meta: dams, floods, locks, mammals, Mississippi River, shipped
